intro.title: Storytelling for the digital age.
intro.listPreamble: I wear many different hats, but above all I like to think of myself as a storyteller. Storytelling in the digital age involves a lot of different aspects:
intro.l1: Mastering standard tools like SQL, Python, Pandas and Plotly as well as invoative technologies such as Svelte and Rust
intro.l2: Meeting people where they are and speaking their language, whether that be a lay person, a buisness consultant or an academic researcher.
intro.l3: Understanding the interplay between textual and visual language so we can use both to their fullest potential.
intro.l4: A drive to understand complex situations, hard problems and discover what's at their roots.

tb.title: Counting bacteria in microsopy images.
tb.problemStatement: For medical research into tuberculosis, bacteria need to be counted manually in microscopy images. This is error prone and very labour intensive, so having an automated solution for this would greatly improve research capabilities.
tb.solutionDescription: A simple annotation GUI for standardized data annotation, and a computer vision implementation to perform the counting.
tb.outcomes: 10x increase in data availability due to application, and a publication of this research at an IEEE conference

fairness.title: Predictive fairness auditing.
fairness.problemStatement: Unless care is taken, predictive models will reinforce existing biases towards protected characteristics (race, gender, religtion etc.). The first step to mitigating is gaining a robust understanding of how and when it happens.
fairness.solutionDescription: Review of existing solutions, both in academic literature as in existing software, with recommendations on which methodology to apply them.
fairness.outcomes: A report containing a literature review and proposal for a implementation framework presented to department's C-suite.
